projects.title: Gurumi the Florist
projects.description: This is a CRUD app for managing flower products. Made with React and Redux for frontend and Rails for backend using Postgres database.

projects.title: Brio Mobile
projects.description: This is a habit tracker/ activity suggestion app made with React Native using Redux and Redux-Saga. It has data visualization using JS libraries, and also integrates Spotify API for OAuth and user details.

projects.title: Typing Game
projects.description: Simple English typing game for Japanese speakers Made with vanilla JavaScript.

projects.title: Sudoku
projects.description: Simple sudoku game made with react native and TypeScript.
